Text.Page:
You're the one who found the map?

I've heard legends about that map since I was a child.

I spent my fortune accquiring a ship like this to make use of it, and here we are. To think of all the treasures waiting for me!

I'll get the ship ready to sail. You have the map with you, right?

The Shipmaster can send you to the 'Goldenscale'

The Sea of Honor is a 5-player dungeon.
- You must have a map to advance the dungeon.
